Title: Fallen World
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Dan Nowak, Hallie Lambert (staff writer)
Actors: Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper, Wes Chatham
Plot: Drummer and Ashford find themselves trapped with few options for survival; Anna tends to the wounded masses as Melba continues to hunt down her prey; the Rocinante crew struggles to survive as Naomi reunites with her true family.
